DeleteById
data.value: delete from [{0}] where StructureId = @id;

data.name: DeleteByIds
data.value: delete from [{0}] where StructureId in ({1});

data.name: DeleteByQuery
data.value: delete from [{0}] where StructureId in({1});

data.name: DeleteStructureFromSisoDbIdentitiesTable
data.value: delete from [SisoDbIdentities] where [EntityName] = @entityName;

data.name: DeleteWhereIdIsBetween
data.value: delete from [{0}] where StructureId >= @idFrom and StructureId <= @idTo;

data.name: DropTable
data.value: drop table [{0}];

data.name: ExistsById
data.value: select 1 from [{0}] where StructureId =@id;

data.name: GetAllJson
data.value: select Json from [{0}] order by [StructureId];

data.name: GetJsonById
data.value: select Json from [{0}] where StructureId =@id;

data.name: GetJsonByIds
data.value: select Json from [{0}] where StructureId in ({1});

data.name: GetJsonWhereIdIsBetween
data.value: select Json from [{0}] where StructureId between @idFrom and @idTo;

data.name: IndexesSchemaSynchronizer_DeleteRecordsMatchingKeyNames
data.value: delete from [{0}] where [{1}] in({2});

data.name: IndexesSchemaSynchronizer_GetKeyNames
data.value: select distinct [{0}] from [{1}];

data.name: Query
QueryReturningStructureIds
data.value: [%Start%] select distinct s.[StructureId] from [[%MainStructureTable%]] s [%WhereAndSortingJoins%][%WhereCriteria%] [%End%]

data.name: RowCount
data.value: select count(*) from [{0}];

data.name: RowCountByQuery
data.value: select count(*) from [{0}] s where s.StructureId in({1});

data.name: Sys_Identities_Create
Sys_Identities_Exists
data.value: select count(TABLE_NAME) from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME='SisoDbIdentities';

data.name: Sys_Identities_GetNext
data.value: select ([CurrentId] + 1) from [SisoDbIdentities] where [EntityName] = @entityName;

data.name: Sys_Identities_Increase
data.value: update [SisoDbIdentities] set [CurrentId] = ([CurrentId] + @numOfIds) where [EntityName] = @entityName;

data.name: TableExists
data.value: select count(TABLE_NAME) from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES where TABLE_NAME=@tableName;

data.name: UniquesSchemaSynchronizer_DeleteRecordsMatchingKeyNames
data.value: delete from [{0}] where [{1}] in({2});
